Content: Major General N.D Wanniarachchi, the newly-appointed 29th Adjutant General at the Army Headquarters assumed Office this morning (16) in a simple ceremony. Major General Wanniarachchi after observance of religious rites placed his signature in an official document to symbolize his acceptance of the new office at the Army Headquarters. Staff Officers in the Adjutant General Branch, Commanding Officer at the Army Headquarters and a few more senior Officers were present during the occasion. Before this new appointment, he served as the General Officer Commanding of the 12 Division at Hambantota. He succeeds Major General Shavendra Silva who is now the Chief of Staff at the Army Headquarters.
